version_description: Fixed some outstanding bugs and added live tools to System Manager networks, as well as a new view for scoped admin.
Added back support for non 64 bit devices
Added support for MV networks. Add, set up, and monitor your MV camera devices right from the app!

Camera:
*Minor tweaks to save data
*Finer focus controls

• Added support for iPhone X, XR, XS, XS Max, 11, 11 Pro, and 11 Pro Max
• Added support for choosing to view the Primary or Secondary MX when in HA
• Fixed a bug where certain accounts were unable to log in
• Fixed a bug that would cause uploading mounting photos for devices to sporadically fail
• Fixed a bug that caused the VPN Registry incorrectly display “Disconnected”
• Fixed multiple bugs around Google Maps incorrectly loading
• Fixed an issue where we were unable to resolve current location, even though location permissions were enabled
• Fixed an issue where adding devices from inventory would erroneously fail, while still adding the device

• Fixed a feature regression where you could no longer view MV live feeds in fullscreen mode
• Fixed a bug where viewing the local status page information for the connected node would fail
• Fixed a bug where users would sometimes see a blank white screen on app re-launch
• Minor performance improvements

An all new Cisco Meraki mobile experience!

- Brand new UI/UX, designed for mobile first interactions with your dashboard
- Log in with Face ID and Touch ID (Configured via Settings -> Account)
- Configure switch ports, SSIDs, client policies, device details
- Add new Cisco Meraki devices to your network by quickly scanning it's barcode in app (Devices -> "+")
- Manage your systems manager devices and network clients easily from the all new unified clients list
- Check the health of your Cisco Meraki wireless deployment with Wireless Health
- Pull to refresh to get the most up to date information, including any new networks and organizations

Feature: Camera admins can now log in to the app for a tailored MV view!
Feature: Throughput live tool is now available!
Feature: Device list search now supports searching by tag!
Bugfix: Fixed an issue that was stopping errors from displaying when using the device onboarding tool
Bugfix: Fixed an issue causing Clients and SM Devices to show the incorrect status
Bugfix: Fixed a network error when viewing clients on a network without an MX
Bugfix: Handle errors on log in more gracefully now

Feature: Sensor event logs now include alert profile names on door and water sensor events!
Feature: New troubleshooting tools now available (DNS, Ping Host, Traceroute)!
Bugfix: Fixed an issue with organization status indicators not loading on the Organization Choose screen
Bugfix: Fixed an issue where throughput limitations were displayed in the wrong units on Group Policies
Bugfix: Fixed an issue that was causing the number of networks in the network picker to be capped at 1000
